(Ok, until I figure out why this thing is going AWAL all of a sudden, I'm 
using ~ ~ as my com)


Ramhorn:

Recieving Prowl's message, he activated a comlink.  

~I don't know the whole story, but I do know, after that pscyho helped Suukie 
escape after murdering Stinkbomb, and said she would kill us all, her troops 
open fire on us.  I find those to be some small coincidenses.  So, until 
further questioning, lock her up and follow the rest of my orders.  Instead 
though, find someone to guard her.  Those are your orders, I'd prefer no more 
hesitation.~
